name: jui-filter-rules
short_description:
jui_filter_rules is a jQuery plugin, useful to create dataset filter rules as JSON object and the relevant WHERE SQL.

jui_filter_rules v1.0.0 was released (24 Jan 2013)

License MIT

Project page http://pontikis.net/labs/jui_filter_rules/

Documentation http://pontikis.net/labs/jui_filter_rules/docs/

Demo http://pontikis.net/labs/jui_filter_rules/demo/

Download https://github.com/pontikis/jui_filter_rules/archive/master.zip
summary: jQuery plugin, provides dataset filter rules
